Paragraph: No WT1 mutations were detected in the six other IDMS patients , suggesting genetic heterogeneity of this disease .

| IDMS (Immune Dysregulation, Mitochondrial Disorders, and Sensorineural Deafness) |

In this paragraph, the disease entity is "IDMS (Immune Dysregulation, Mitochondrial Disorders, and Sensorineural Deafness)". The paragraph is stating that no mutations in the WT1 gene were detected in six other patients with this disease, implying genetic heterogeneity.
